extendedInfo.description: Titan Message Scheduler allows users to schedule, manage and send text messages to family and friends. This is the Ad Free Version. * Ability to send messages using Google Voice and standard text messages.* Schedule re-occurring messages on a hourly, daily, weekly, monthly or yearly basis.* Manage, search and sort scheduled messages.* Mass text message scheduling. Can be used for group announcements.* Free version available.Keywords: Email, sms,schedule, scheduler, google voice, sms scheduler, schedalls, auto sms, schedule sms wishes, handcent sms, google voice schedule text messages, google voice sms

reviews.title: Great app that uses Google voice
reviews.comment: Nice app has every thing I need be one feature that would be nice is ta have the ability to send the message s every other week.
reviews.author: Zo\303\253 Mullee

reviews.title: Free version works this does not
reviews.comment: Scheduled messages just sit there and never send.
reviews.author: jacob zimmerman

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: To use this app on htc wildfire is a real challenge. Real stupid updates since last time i used this app to send a sms at specific time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I wish I could give this a better rating, but it hasn\'t been reliable. I\'ve seen a number of messages draft and schedule OK but then not get sent.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: NEW UPDATE to 2.0 adds send now Great app! More efficient than other similar apps.
reviews.author: A Google User
